byline.contributor: Christopher Drew and Steven Erlanger contributed reporting.

abstract: Dow Jones industrial average rises 162.42 points, or 1.39 percent, to 11,869.04; Standard & Poor's 500-stock average rises 1 percent to 1,242; Nasdaq Composite Index rises 0.46 percent to 2,650.67.
snippet: Investors were looking to a summit meeting in Europe for at least an outline of how the debt crisis would be resolved.
lead_paragraph: Investors were looking to a summit meeting in Europe for at least an outline of how the debt crisis would be resolved.

headline.main: Shares Rise as Europe Meets on Debt Crisis
headline.print_headline: Shares Rise as Europe Meets on Debt Crisis
headline.seo: Shares Rise as Europe Meets on Debt Crisis
